metadata.title: CVE-2018-19974 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In YARA 3.8.1, bytecode in a specially crafted compiled rule can readuninitialized data from VM scratch memory in libyara/exec.c. This can allowattackers to discover addresses in the real stack (not the YARA virtualstack).

criterions.comment: yara: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
